Reason: The 'allocate_tokens_for_keyspace' configuration is performance-sensitive because it directly affects the token allocation strategy, which in turn impacts the distribution of data across cluster nodes. This can lead to significant performance variations at the system level, especially in terms of performance and load balancing.
